entry.content:
best Hug Day Pictures, Images, Photos, Wallpapers for Desktop, Pc, Computer in Full HD, Widescreen

Tujh Se Kabhi Bhi Door Nahi Hona Chahta
Tum Se Kabhi Bhi Bichharna Nai Chahta
Naa Mein Tumhey Khona Chahta Hon
Naa Teri Yad Mein Rona Chahta Hon
Jab Tak Zindagi Hai Mein Humesha
Tumharey Saath Rehna Chahta Hon
Buhat Behs Main Main Nahi Parta
Bus Yhi Baat Tumsey Kehna Chahta Hon.
Happy Propose Day>>>>
